subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Error blamed for Mars probe's loss
NASA says human error led to battery failure that doomed the Mars Global Surveyor. Scientists lost contact with probe in November





2. Accused wife: 'My ugly came out'





3. Spokesman: Corzine not belted in





4. Coach: Imus' apology accepted





5. Commentary: Imus might be spark for debate on sexism





6. LaBeouf to appear in 'Indiana 4'





7. Cheney plane hits bird, no damage





8. Man races world's fastest cat





9. Gunman apologizes during robbery





10. Pope's new book plugs 'real Jesus'




 
















Man races cheetah
Rugby star Bryan Habana races a cheetah to help save them from extinction. CNN's Jeff Koinange reports (April 13)
